articles.content:
Reception Given in Cuba 
   Havana, October 7 (KCNA) -- A reception was hosted at the DPRK embassy in Havana on Oct. 5 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 80th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
 Present there on invitation were the head of the International Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of Cuba who is a member of the Secretariat of the C.C. and a member of the C.C. of the party, the director of Higher Party School who is a member of the C.C. of the party, the president of the Prensa Latina News Agency, the commander of the Air and Anti-Aircraft Defense Forces of the Ministry of Revolutionary Armed Forces, a vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, the secretary general of the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America, the vice-president of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, the chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and other leading officials of the party, the state, the army and social organizations.    
 The ambassador and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Havana were on hand.

Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a congratulatory letter by the foreign economic and commercial councilors corps here on the occasion of the 61st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 80th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
 It was handed to an official concerned by Evelio Duenas Ponce, commercial councilor of the Cuban embassy here who is doyen of the corps, on Monday.

Nepalese Library Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Nepalese Library Delegation Arrives
   Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Library of Nepal headed by its Director Narayan Prasad Sapkota arrived here Sunday.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches
   Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 Dau Xuan Long, military attache of the Vietnamese embassy here, handed the letter to an official concerned Monday on behalf of the corps.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Nepalese Library Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Nepalese Library Delegation
   Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the delegation of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Library of Nepal on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 61st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned on Monday by Director of the library Narayan Prasad Sapkota who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from the family of Zhang Weihua, an anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 The floral basket was handed to an official concerned on Monday by Zhang Qi, grandson of Zhang Weihua staying in Korea.

articles.title: A Floral Basket to C.C., WPK from C.C., CPC
articles.content:
A Floral Basket to C.C., WPK from C.C., CPC
   Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A floral basket came to the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea from the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the WPK.
 It was handed to an official concerned by Guan Huabing, minister councilor of the Chinese embassy here, on Monday.
